message: Let's start fair. I take the majority, but you still get a decent share.
That's a bit greedy Alice! How about a more even split this time?
Okay, I'll compromise. Let's split it 70/30.  We're running out of time, so let's be reasonable.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm being more than fair. Take this deal before inflation eats away at your share even more!
